message.subject: TXT file
message.content:
M2.1. Brian,
[Conventional: salutation]
M2.2. Everything was fine with the file.
[Inform: everything was fine with file]
M2.3. From now on could you please divide it
into three separate files? [Y]
[Request-Action: divide file into three separate files in the future]
Flink1.3
M2.4. I've attached the files that I loaded for the
17th,
[Inform: Robin attached files that s/he loaded for the 17th]
M2.5. so if you just keep the same name (just update the date everyday) that
would help me a lot. [Y]
[Inform: if Brian keeps the same name with updated dates this would help Robin]
M2.6. As for the master deal id, as long as they are all
unique what you had was fine.
[Inform: as long as master deal IDs are all unique, what Brian had was fine]
M2.7. If you have any more questions just give me a call.
[Inform: Brian should call if he has more questions]
